optionsport.title: Building an Options Portfolio with Deep Learning
optionsport.summary: MASTER'S THESIS: Apply state of the art deep learning architectures to over 15 years and 300 tickers worth of daily implied volatility data to create the novel Options Portfolio Transformer.

redditnlp.title: Exploring Fan Sentiment in the Digital Realm
redditnlp.summary: Utilize advanced NLP techniques to analyze fan social media sentiment towards individual players on the 2022-23 L.A. Lakers and link fan sentiment to on-court performance

wine.title: Unraveling Wine Sentiments through Deep Learning
wine.summary: Use Vivino review data to train and analyze deep-learning embedding layers and deploy Tensorflow embedding projector; develop AI review generator through transfer learning with GPT2

optdb.title: Options Database and Live Volatility Surface App
optdb.summary: Build AWS MySQL DB that automatically updates stock/option price data from Yahoo Finance, uploading 1 million rows of data daily. Develop a live volatility surface app for live visualization

combine.title: Empowering NFL Personnel Decisions through ML
combine.summary: Logistic Regression and R.F. models are used to predict drafted status based on player combine stats, then PCR and XGBoost models are developed to predict draft position

imdb.title: IMDb Data Analysis & Movie Budget Generator
imdb.summary: What factors determine box-office profitability? Scrape data for over 5000 films, develop Fully Connected NN to predict Box Office Profit, and create profit-generator dashboard

website.title: Creating my Portfolio Website
website.summary: Utilize Plotly Dash to design website; create and embed various dashboards for individual projects; Deploy website using AWS Elastic Beanstalk.

nflwinner.title: Building a Winner in the Modern NFL
nflwinner.summary: How can NFL teams optimize resources? Salary Cap and Draft Capital Resource Allocation is analyzed by position using Linear Model and GAM Kernel Regression.

fbrefapi.title: Football Reference Flask API
fbrefapi.summary: Build a Flask RESTful API allowing users to easily get data from 13 distinct endpoints, and deploy serverlessly using AWS Lambda

soccerdb.title: International Soccer Database
soccerdb.summary: Build an expansive, automatically updated database covering over 70 leagues, 2,000 teams and 90,000 players

bettingtransformer.title: The Betting Transformer (Current Project)
bettingtransformer.summary: Leverage soccer database to develop a player-based predictive model that will connect to a betting model to generate betting alpha
